meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed metoprolols to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: She takes metoprolols every morning to manage her chest pain.
meanings.sent3: After taking metoprolols, I felt like a weight had been lifted off my chest!
meanings.sent4: The metoprolols acted like a shield, protecting my heart from high blood pressure.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained how metoprolols work to keep the heart healthy.

meanings.definition: The plural form of metoprolol, referring to multiple doses of the medication.
meanings.sent1: I need to pick up my metoprolols from the pharmacy today.
meanings.sent2: The metoprolols in her bag were enough for a month's supply.
meanings.sent3: Carrying around all these metoprolols makes me feel like a walking pharmacy!
meanings.sent4: The metoprolols on the shelf looked like tiny soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: Counting out the metoprolols reminded me to take my medication regularly.
